Original: That request is from the Outland Count
about the marks. He supposedly found
a new document...
[Page]
I wonder what he will have you looking
for this time. You will need to visit
him at the Grand Court to find out...
Translation: That request is from the Outland Count
about the marks. He supposedly found
a new document...
[Page]
I wonder what he will have you looking
for this time. You will need to visit
him at the Grand Court to find out...

Original: I again thank you for your hard work.
It sounds like a beast attacked when
you solved the mystery?
[Page]
To open the lid... only to find a
beast waiting. Haha, it is not
uncommon in this world.
[Page]
But the fact that you were able to
pacify such a beast is a reward in
itself, yes?
[Page]
Here, then, is your reward from the
Outland Count.
Translation: I again thank you for your hard work.
It sounds like a beast attacked when
you solved the mystery?
[Page]
To open the lid... only to find a
beast waiting. Haha, it is not
uncommon in this world.
[Page]
But the fact that you were able to
pacify such a beast is a reward in
itself, yes?
[Page]
Here, then, is your reward from the
Outland Count.

Original: Oh... Oh yes, the request. I think it
may be fortunate that you were the
ones to accept it.
[Page]
An explorer who was investigating the
ruins within the labyrinth, like
yourselves, found an odd slate.
[Page]
This is what it says... Please pay
close attention.
Translation: Oh... Oh yes, the request. I think it
may be fortunate that you were the
ones to accept it.
[Page]
An explorer who was investigating the
ruins within the labyrinth, like
yourselves, found an odd slate.
[Page]
This is what it says... Please pay
close attention.

Original: "Water drills earth, changing form.
Earth blocks wind, changing paths.
Wind blows out fire, changing light.
[Page]
"And what does fire do...?
Only fire can erase it.
Thus is balance maintained.
[Page]
"The ancient one is its protector.
Those who enter its realm will face
its judgement."
Translation: "Water drills earth, changing form.
Earth blocks wind, changing paths.
Wind blows out fire, changing light.
[Page]
"And what does fire do...?
Only fire can erase it.
Thus is balance maintained.
[Page]
"The ancient one is its protector.
Those who enter its realm will face
its judgement."

Original: That is it. I wonder about that last
part... How those who enter its realm
face judgement from the "ancient one."
[Page]
I worry that this "ancient one" may
be a threat to soldiers and explorers.
If so, we may have to eliminate it.
[Page]
That is why I want you to solve the
riddle of the slate and find out what
this "ancient one" is.
Translation: That is it. I wonder about that last
part... How those who enter its realm
face judgement from the "ancient one."
[Page]
I worry that this "ancient one" may
be a threat to soldiers and explorers.
If so, we may have to eliminate it.
[Page]
That is why I want you to solve the
riddle of the slate and find out what
this "ancient one" is.

Original: Ah, is something wrong? Was there
anything you didn't understand?
Translation: Ah, is something wrong? Was there
anything you didn't understand?

Original: [Color:5]Do you have a question?[Color:0]
Ask to check the document
Ask about the four marks
Ask the Count's opinion
Translation: [Color:5]Do you have a question?[Color:0]
Ask to check the document
Ask about the four marks
Ask the Count's opinion

Original: I see. Well then, listen carefully...
Translation: I see. Well then, listen carefully...

Original: And that's as far as it goes. Of all
the documents we've seen, this one
has an unusual flavor to it...
Translation: And that's as far as it goes. Of all
the documents we've seen, this one
has an unusual flavor to it...

Original: The four marks... So you noticed
it too.
[Page]
The marks are at [Color:5]A-2/5-5, for earth[Color:5],
[Color:5]A-4/5-1, for water[Color:5], [Color:5]C-2/1-5, for
fire[Color:5]...
[Page]
And [Color:5]C-4/1-1, for wind[Color:5]. I wonder how
the crests relate to one another...
Translation: The four marks... So you noticed
it too.
[Page]
The marks are at [Color:5]A-2/5-5, for earth[Color:5],
[Color:5]A-4/5-1, for water[Color:5], [Color:5]C-2/1-5, for
fire[Color:5]...
[Page]
And [Color:5]C-4/1-1, for wind[Color:5]. I wonder how
the crests relate to one another...

Original: I think there might be a connection
with the marks you discovered in the
Cloudy Stronghold.
[Page]
Look at that first line... Water
changes earth, which changes wind,
which blows out fire, and...
[Page]
Hmm. It's a poser, to be sure. Where
is it referring to? Or does it have
a different meaning...?
[Page]
Why not try listing out the mentioned
elements and see if that sparks any
ideas in you?
Translation: I think there might be a connection
with the marks you discovered in the
Cloudy Stronghold.
[Page]
Look at that first line... Water
changes earth, which changes wind,
which blows out fire, and...
[Page]
Hmm. It's a poser, to be sure. Where
is it referring to? Or does it have
a different meaning...?
[Page]
Why not try listing out the mentioned
elements and see if that sparks any
ideas in you?

Original: Ah, is something wrong? Was there
anything you didn't understand?
Translation: Ah, is something wrong? Was there
anything you didn't understand?

Original: [Color:5]Do you have a question?[Color:0]
Say you defeated the ancient one
Ask about the four marks
Ask the Count's opinion
Translation: [Color:5]Do you have a question?[Color:0]
Say you defeated the ancient one
Ask about the four marks
Ask the Count's opinion

Original: Aha... So you've accomplished your
task. I was right to give this one to
you. What did the document mean?
Translation: Aha... So you've accomplished your
task. I was right to give this one to
you. What did the document mean?

Original: Hmm... I see... So you passed over
each crest in a certain order, and
this bird guardian reacted to that...
[Page]
If that is true, [Color:5]performing the same
steps might draw out the bird again[Color:0],
should you desire to challenge it.
[Page]
But there is no need for that now.
Go to the Dancing Peacock and collect
the reward you've earned.
Translation: Hmm... I see... So you passed over
each crest in a certain order, and
this bird guardian reacted to that...
[Page]
If that is true, [Color:5]performing the same
steps might draw out the bird again[Color:0],
should you desire to challenge it.
[Page]
But there is no need for that now.
Go to the Dancing Peacock and collect
the reward you've earned.

Original: Exploring leads to knowing what was
unknown. But some things are better
left that way, it's true...
[Page]
Perhaps this means we should not be
so eager to trespass on that forbidden
territory any further...
Translation: Exploring leads to knowing what was
unknown. But some things are better
left that way, it's true...
[Page]
Perhaps this means we should not be
so eager to trespass on that forbidden
territory any further...

Original: After solving the mystery of the
marks and flying your skyship in the
given order, you feel a violent chill.
[Page]
Some terrifying monster is closing in
on your ship!
[Page]
You have only moments to decide
whether you will flee or stand and
face the thing!
Translation: After solving the mystery of the
marks and flying your skyship in the
given order, you feel a violent chill.
[Page]
Some terrifying monster is closing in
on your ship!
[Page]
You have only moments to decide
whether you will flee or stand and
face the thing!

Original: [Color:5]Will you engage the beast?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Will you engage the beast?[Color:0]

Original: In the next instant, a sharp wind
assails you and the skyship is covered
by a large shadow! The enemy is nigh!
[Page]
There is no turning back now! You
grip your weapons tightly, ready for
a fight to the finish with the beast!
Translation: In the next instant, a sharp wind
assails you and the skyship is covered
by a large shadow! The enemy is nigh!
[Page]
There is no turning back now! You
grip your weapons tightly, ready for
a fight to the finish with the beast!

Original: It seems the shadow has judged you not
to be a threat and flown away.
Translation: It seems the shadow has judged you not
to be a threat and flown away.

Original: You have overcome the birdlike beast!
This must have been the "ancient one"
spoken of on the slate.
[Page]
All that remains is to report your
achievement to the Outland Count for
this request to be completed!
Translation: You have overcome the birdlike beast!
This must have been the "ancient one"
spoken of on the slate.
[Page]
All that remains is to report your
achievement to the Outland Count for
this request to be completed!

Original: You feel no imminent threat...
You have already defeated the
ancient one, after all.
Translation: You feel no imminent threat...
You have already defeated the
ancient one, after all.
